skills.name: REJUVENATION
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 65% Chance to Heal all allies on Perfect Attacks.

skills.name: DANCING SUN
desc: • Grants Heal Shield to all allies for 3 turns.
• Heal Shield reduces damage and heals for a percentage of damage taken.

skills.name: RELIEVE
desc: Increase the effectiveness of healing for all allies at the start of battle for 3 turns.
